Class PolygonDeformable

  • java.lang.Object
    • movingmorphingmasking.data.topology.PolygonDeformable

  • public class PolygonDeformable
extends java.lang.Object
    The PolygonDeformable class defines a polygon with movable corners.

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getTagetArea

        public double getTagetArea()
        Returns the targetArea of this.
        Returns:
        target area.

      • getCurrentArea

        public double getCurrentArea()
        Returns the current area of the PolygonDeformable. It uses the Shoelace formula. 2*Area = |sum from i= 1 to n (y_i+y_(i+i)*(x_i+x_(i+i))| It is assumed that the polygon is simple.
        Returns:
        area of this.

      • getCorners

        public CornerPoint2D[] getCorners()
        Returns the corners of the PolygonDeformable.
        Returns:
        corners of this.
